name: J & B Medical Supply Co INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: J & B Medical Supply Co INC is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies provider based in Wixom, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $86.1M in Medicaid payments across 3.8M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $86.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
